item.title: 中东最新液化天然气进口商准备接收首批货物
item.description: 巴林最快将于本月接收第一批液化天然气货物，成为随着能源需求激增而进口这种燃料的最新一个中东国家。【原文：Bahrain will receive its first liquefied natural gas cargo as soon as this month, becoming the latest Middle Eastern nation to import the fuel as energy demand soars.】

item.title: 劳力士金表需求急剧上升，金属创下历史新高
item.description: 随着贵金属价格的飙升和收藏家对更华丽表款的追捧，二手劳力士 SA 金表的需求也在不断上升。【原文：Demand for used gold Rolex SA watches is rising as precious metal prices soar and collectors seek dressier models.】

item.title: 当世界最需要避风港时，避风港资产却在衰退
item.description: 在多年来最剧烈的一次市场大跌中，避险资产的表现乏善可陈，这使得投资者开始寻求新的保护方式。【原文：A lackluster run for haven assets during one of the most acute market selloffs in years has left investors seeking new forms of protection.】

item.title: 关税开始实施，欧洲天然气随更广泛的金融市场下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普开始征收关税，欧洲天然气价格进一步下滑，对全球经济和能源需求造成打击。【原文：European natural gas prices slid further as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs kicked in, dealing a blow to the global economy and demand for energy.】

item.title: 特朗普关税生效，欧洲股市期货下挫
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税措施生效，欧洲股票期货周三暴跌，引发全球金融市场再度下挫。【原文：European stock futures tumbled on Wednesday as President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs took effect, triggering a renewed selloff across global financial markets.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：特朗普加征关税，英国股市重陷低迷
亚洲国家承诺购买更多美国天然气以赢得关税减免
item.description: 从韩国到印尼，亚洲各国政府正急于签署从美国购买液化天然气的协议，希望借此减少与世界最大经济体之间的贸易顺差，并从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面 "互惠 "关税中获得一些缓解。【原文：Asian governments from South Korea to Indonesia are rushing to sign up for liquefied natural gas purchases from the US, hoping to reduce trade surpluses with the world’s largest economy and secure some relief from President Donald Trump’s sweeping “reciprocal” tariffs.】

item.title: 期待已久的特朗普通话后，韩国期待达成 "重大 "贸易协议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与韩国代总统韩德洙（Han Duck-soo）在最后一刻通电话后，韩国正在寻求与美国达成一项 "重大 "贸易协议，这为这个受关税冲击严重的出口依赖型国家带来了一些缓解的前景。【原文：South Korea is seeking to cut a “big” trade deal with the US after a last-minute phone call between Donald Trump and Acting President Han Duck-soo raised the prospects of bringing some relief to the export-reliant nation hit hard by tariffs blitz.】

item.title: 国债 "热卖 "令全球长期收益率飙升
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级，人们对美国国债的避风港地位产生了怀疑，较长期限国债的抛售加速，加剧了全球等价债券的低迷。【原文：A selloff in longer-dated Treasuries accelerated, worsening the slump in bond equivalents across the globe, as an escalation in the trade war sowed doubts over the haven status of US government debt.】

item.title: 受关税影响，印度股市将创 2009 年以来亚洲股市最大涨幅
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税被认为对印度的前景影响相对有限，印度股市的表现有望创下自 2009 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Indian stocks are on pace to outperform regional peers by the most since 2009 as President Donald Trump’s tariffs are seen to have relatively limited impact on the country’s prospects.】

item.title: 104% 正在加倍愚蠢
item.description:
美国和中国都表示他们拥有作战手段，因此我们也就顺水推舟了。【原文：

We’re along for the ride, as both the US and China suggest they have the means to fight.

】

item.title: 中国对美国新关税立即采取报复行动
item.description: 中国没有立即对美国的新关税做出回应，这与前两次美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高关税、中国政府在几分钟内做出反击的情况不同。【原文：China hasn’t immediately responded to the new US tariffs, a departure from the last two episodes when President Donald Trump hiked duties and Beijing hit back within minutes.】

item.title: 尽管有稳定基金的支持，台湾股市仍然暴跌
item.description: 台湾股市周三继续大幅下挫，即使在当地政府授权国家金融稳定基金出手救市之后仍是如此。【原文：Taiwan stocks continued their heavy selloff on Wednesday, even after the local government authorized its National Financial Stabilization Fund to step in to buoy the market.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）说，千载难逢的大崩溃正在发生
item.description: 雷-达里奥警告说，投资者过于狭隘地专注于关税问题，而对主要货币、政治和地缘政治秩序中出现的 "一生一次 "的更大崩溃关注不够。【原文：Ray Dalio warned that investors are too narrowly fixated on tariffs and not paying enough attention to the bigger “once in a lifetime” breakdown occurring in major monetary, political and geopolitical orders.】

item.title: 关税生效之际，印度央行降息促增长
item.description: 印度央行一如预期下调了利率，并发出了将采取更多宽松政策的信号，以在美国征收破坏性关税的情况下扶持亚洲第三大经济体。【原文：India’s central bank cut interest rates as expected and signaled more easing to come as it seeks to bolster Asia’s third-largest economy in the face of damaging US tariffs.】

item.title: 马来西亚花旗集团称目前难以退出私人资产
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金（Khazanah Nasional Bhd.）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收全球关税所带来的不确定性使其在审查投资组合时很难退出私人资产。【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd. said the uncertainty stemming from US President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs is making it difficult to exit private assets as it reviews its portfolio.】

item.title: 印度消费类股抵御关税引发的全球大跌
item.description: 受农村需求前景改善和估值降低的提振，印度的大宗消费品股票正在成为一个亮点，抵御了本周的全球大跌。【原文：Consumer staples stocks in India are emerging as a bright spot, defying this week’s global selloff, buoyed by improving rural demand prospects and lower valuations.】

item.title: 特朗普关税推动避险天堂需求，日元反弹 1
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策继续刺激避险需求，日元升值了 1%。【原文：The yen strengthened 1% as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs continued to boost haven demand.】

item.title: 日本寻求尽早达成美国关税协议，官员忧心忡忡，股价下滑
item.description: 在东京的部长们反复警告美国关税的影响以及股市再次下滑之际，日本官员抵达华盛顿举行会谈，日本试图保持其争取美国关税缓和的势头。【原文：Japan sought to keep up momentum in its bid for a reprieve from US tariffs, with its officials arriving in Washington for talks as ministers in Tokyo repeated warnings about the impact of the levies and the stock market renewed its slide.】

item.title: 特朗普关税生效，贸易征税创百年新高
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统所谓的互惠关税现已实施，在他推进大幅调整全球贸易秩序的努力中，给世界经济带来了雷霆一击。【原文：President Donald Trump’s so-called reciprocal tariffs are now in place, dealing a thunderous blow to the world economy as he pushes forward efforts to drastically reorder global trade.】

item.title: 糟糕的股市对机器人有利，对选股人不利
item.description:
在股票牛市中，主动型基金经理很难战胜被动型基金。但这并不意味着目前的震荡很容易被选中。【原文：

It’s hard for active managers to beat passive funds in an equity bull market. But that doesn’t mean the current gyrations offer easy pickings.

】

item.title: 西班牙力促欧盟以中国为支点应对特朗普关税
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）此次访问习近平主席，将有机会就一个共同的问题交换意见：如何应对越来越不可靠的美国。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez’s trip to see President Xi Jinping will offer a chance to swap notes on a common problem: how to respond to an increasingly unreliable US.】

item.title: 印尼盾跌至历史最低点，关税紧张局势加剧
item.description: 印尼盾兑美元汇率跌至历史最低点，原因是市场参与者对全球贸易摩擦加剧的影响进行了定价。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah fell to its lowest in history against the dollar as market participants priced in the impact of rising trade frictions around the globe.】

item.title: 橡树资本将香港商业大厦推向市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）从房地产投资商凯龙集团（Kailong Group）手中接过香港湾仔区一栋商业大楼的所有权后，正在为这栋大楼寻找买家。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is looking for a buyer for a commercial building in Hong Kong’s Wan Chai district, after taking ownership of the property from real estate investor Kailong Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本长期债券暴跌，波动性削弱了人们的胃口
item.description: 由于市场波动加剧促使投资者减少对收益率波动的投资，日本长期国债大幅下跌。【原文：Japan’s long-dated government bonds plunged as elevated market volatility prompted investors to trim their exposure to fluctuating yields.】

item.title: 美联储暂缓对 2025 年的展望促使 PineBridge 建立现金堆
item.description: PineBridge 投资公司（PineBridge Investments）看好现金而非国债，因为他们押注美联储今年将继续按兵不动，而全球贸易战将加剧物价压力。【原文：PineBridge Investments is favoring cash over Treasuries on bets that the Federal Reserve will stay on hold this year as the global trade war stokes price pressures.】

item.title: 印度央行有望降息，投资者看好印度银行股
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 特朗普称承诺已久的药品关税很快就会出台
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他承诺已久的对药品征收关税的计划将很快实施，这是一个最新的信号，表明尽管他的全球征税政策对市场造成了影响，但他仍计划继续推进更多的行业关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said his long-promised tariffs on pharmaceutical drugs will be coming soon, the latest signal that he plans to press ahead with more sectoral tariffs despite market fallout from his global levies.】

item.title: 长江和记股价抹去巴拿马港口交易以来的所有涨幅
item.description: 长江和记实业控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）股价周三扩大跌幅，抹去了自该公司上月同意将巴拿马运河港口资产出售给贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）牵头的财团以来的所有涨幅。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. shares extended declines on Wednesday, erasing all their gains since the company agreed to sell its Panama Canal port assets to a BlackRock Inc.-led consortium last month.】

item.title: 关税带来下行风险，新西兰央行认为还有进一步削减的空间
item.description: 新西兰央行连续第五次降息，并表示由于美国关税给经济增长和通胀带来下行风险，央行有进一步降息的空间。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank cut interest rates for a fifth straight meeting and said it has scope for further reductions as US tariffs create downside risks for economic growth and inflation.】
